Package universum.studios.android.officium.service

Groups components which may be used to create an unified service layer hiding requests to a remote server.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EndPoint Deprecated
    Use simple base url instead.
    ServiceApi.Factory<T>
    Basic interface for factories which may be used to create instances of ServiceApi.
    ServiceObject
    Interface for objects that may be associated with services and theirs requests.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseServiceObject
    Base implementation of ServiceObject for objects associated to services.
    ErrorResponse
    A ServiceResponse that may be used to parse body of response send by a server that contains an ErrorResponse.Error object.
    ErrorResponse.Error
    Simple error object that can hold two attributes: ErrorResponse.Error.code and ErrorResponse.Error.message.
    ServiceApi<M extends ServiceManager>
    ServiceApi represents a facade for services provided by a remote server.
    ServiceApiProvider<A>
    ServiceApiProvider represents a provider that can provide a single instance of ServiceApi implementation.
    ServiceCall<T>
    A Call implementation that wraps original Retrofit call to provide functionality that supports association of ServiceCallback with the related service along with service request.
    ServiceCallback<R>
    Base implementation of Callback that may be used to receive a response for a particular service request asynchronously and dispatch it to its receivers.
    ServiceError
    A BaseServiceObject implementation that represents an error occurred during service execution.
    ServiceManager
    Manager that may be used for accessing of multiple instances of services (theirs PROXYies) and also of their configurations.
    ServiceManager.ServicesConfiguration<S>
    Class used for configuration of a specific Retrofit services interface.
    ServiceResponse
    A BaseServiceObject implementation for service objects used to parse body of response send by a server.
    SimpleEndPoint Deprecated
    Use simple base url instead.

Package universum.studios.android.officium.service Description

Groups components which may be used to create an unified service layer hiding requests to a remote server. This layer may be then used by the rest of an Android application.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Martin Albedinsky
